ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.tasks
Class GetImageTask

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.tasks.GetImageTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
GetImageRunnableInterface, TaskInterface
public class GetImageTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskInterface, GetImageRunnableInterface

Responsible for the task of controlling the runnables that are responsible for downloading an image from ElasticSearch.

Author:
Artem Chikin
